whatDrivesUs.title: What drives us?
whatDrivesUs.paragraph1: We believe that inside every person is a special story, just waiting for a chance to shine. Our dream is simple: to see a child's eyes light up reading a book they helped create, or to see an adult smile, rediscovering that spark of imagination.
whatDrivesUs.paragraph2: Mythoria is that magical bridge‚Äîa place where your memories and ideas become beautiful, tangible books. We built it so that creating your story is an act of joy, not a challenge.
whatDrivesUs.linkText: Come and meet the dreamers behind the magic

howItWorks.title: With Mythoria, creating your own story is easy:

step1.title: The Author
step1.description: Log in and let Mythoria know who you are. You'll be the proud author and owner of your unique story.

step2.title: The Story
step2.description: Easily share your story idea by writing, speaking, or even drawing on paper. Mythoria captures and transforms your concept into magic.

step3.title: The Characters
step3.description: Mythoria identifies the characters, but you can personalize every detail. Describe their appearance, passions, and unique traits.

step4.title: The Plot
step4.description: Shape your story exactly as you wish‚Äîselect the graphic style, set the tone, choose your audience, and fine-tune every detail.

step5.title: The Gift
step5.description: Choose how you'd like to receive your masterpiece: as an eBook, an audiobook, or a beautifully printed book.

step6.title: Experience the Magic
step6.description: Children will be captivated seeing themselves in exciting adventures, while adults will be delighted by reliving cherished memories and sharing heartfelt moments.

howItWorks.conclusion: Our Story Factory Oompa-Loompas will handle everything else, bringing your story to life!
